entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Flurries and rain showers late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
